Hey, Mister Ladykiller! Kira! You and your pink cat robot friend oughta party with Franchouchou later. You can hang with ~player~ for now!
Damn, Egghead, think I’d learn to not underestimate you by now. I’m proud a’ you. By the by, if lookin’ at me jill made you horny, I’m here to help out!
I feel like I could go another round. Too bad ~player~ looks tapped out. Ah well, wanna find a back room, just the two of us, Egghead?
Wow, ~player~’s spent. Too bad too, I coulda gone another round. Well, let’s find a love hotel for us two, Egghead.
I could go another round, and from the looks of things, so could you Egghead. ~Player~? Naw, you down for the count. Oh well, looks we’re singin’ by ourselves tonight.
I lost, huh? Damn, I suck. So ~player~, you up for the Franchouchou concert later? Ah, it don’t look like yer gettin’ up for a while. Forget it.
Can’t believe ~name~ was the one to whup me n’ ~player~. Speakin’ of, ~player~, after the show, ya wanna— aw nevermind, you’re spent for today.
Goodbye, ~player~, goodbye, Jane. Will we ever meet again? Feel no sorrow, feel no shame. Come tomorrow, feel no pain.

Ya beat us off to not hafta beat off, ~name~! Good showin’. Now if you can hide your erection, Franchouchou got a show comin’ up. I’d invite you, ~player~, but ya look flattened out. Maybe another time?

epilogue.hint: Saki's epilogue isn't ready yet. Please enjoy this one.
epilogue.title: Under Construction

scene.name: UNDER CONSTRUCTION
scene.directive: You’ve unlocked Saki’s epilogue. Wonderful!
Unfortunately, it is not done yet!
It... is not done yet.
However, this placeholder was created, in order to bugtest the real ending’s unlock conditions.
Now that Mister Solitaire is confident that he can operate the creation tools, work on Jiang-Shi Number Two’s real epilogues can begin in earnest.
Now, I sense you may be wondering why, if the testing stage is complete, this placeholder epilogue still exists?
The answer, of course, is simple: ten seconds of listening to me is time better spent than a century of sex.
Ah, I suppose you’re disappointed because you didn’t get the ending you so passionately sought and worked for?
Well, worry not. Feel free to imagine all sorts of lurid goings-on between you and your putrid corpse wives!
Ah, yes! Just like that!
Wonderful! Your creativity knows no bounds!
Okay, getting a little gross now. Let’s dial it back a bit, shall we?
Ahem. In any case, thank your for your patronage of Saki Nikaidou. Hopefully the final product is as magnificent as anything you could imagine.
It’ll be far greater than that, but I shan't say that aloud.

epilogue.hint: Win a game with Saki in.
epilogue.title: Backstage Pass

scene.name: SCENE 1
scene.directive: You shift uncomfortably in your seat.
The tent pole in your pants isn’t coming down.
After the game, everyone got dressed, said some pleasantries, and went their separate ways.
Before disappearing, Saki elbowed you in the gut with that big grin on her face.
“See ya after the concert,” she murmured.
Never in your life did you imagine falling for a corpse.
Hm?
GOOOOOOD MORNING LADIES AND GENTLEMEN!!!!!
Who’s this douchebag?
For one night only! From Saga Prefecture in Japan! The legendary idol group! FRANCHOUCHOU! Please clap.
Hopefully this concert will distract you from the “situation” in your nether regions.
MUSIC, COME ON!

scene.name: SCENE 2A
scene.directive: The music starts as the girls make their dramatic entrance.

scene.name: SCENE 2B
scene.directive: And there, front and center, is the girl who did a terrible job of pretending she wasn’t in an idol group.
Wow... she looks like a natural onstage. Hard to believe the rough and tumble Saki can slide so easily into the role of an idol.
You watch captivated as Saki sings and dances through the setlist.

scene.name: SCENE 3
scene.directive: All too soon the concert is over. The girls vanish.
And you’re still hard as a diamond.
Maybe you should join another strip poker game. Lose on purpose so you can get off.
Is Saki back at the poker tables? You kinda like the idea of jacking off next to her--
Grhhhhk.
Eh?
Hurrakkkk.
Wait, have you seen this girl before?
Rughk.
A backstage pass and... “2”?
Guoo.
Tae-Chan!
There you are! I was looking all over for you.
You shouldn’t bother these people. Why not chew on Junko-chan instead?
Yrrm!
Wait!
They’re gone. You suppose you should return the key to whoever lost it.

scene.name: SCENE 4
scene.directive: You showed your badge to the disinterested guard by the door. He let you into the backstage area without a second glance.
Seems a safe bet that this key opens door #2.
You knock. No answer.
Maybe you should just leave the lanyard somewhere inside?
You use the key to unlock the door and gingerly step inside.

scene.name: SCENE 5
scene.directive: On autopilot, you close the door behind you.
It sounds like there may be someone in the bathroom.
You call out, letting whoever’s there know their friend with the speech impediment dropped off a lanyard at your table.
Aw crap, you here already, ~player~? Shoulda figured.
That voice coming from behind the door... Saki?
Take a seat on the couch, I’m almost done here.
What is this punk planning? Not that you could even think of disobeying.
Tada! Preparations complete!
Breath-taking, I know.
What was she preparing? She looks the same as onstage.
You’d like to find out?
Well first, ya gonna hafta get outta those tight undies.
Wait, what’d she say--
As your brain processed those words, Saki leapt on you and swiftly undid your pants.

scene.name: SCENE 6
scene.directive: Woah, you’re still this hard?
Maybe I overdid it with all the sexy schlickin’?
Naaaah!
Now let’s rev that motor up as far as it’ll go!
Oh yeah, I can hear that motor purrin’.
You already saw me strippin’, so I’mma just rip my clothes off.
Now then, ta answer yer question...
Surprise!
I gussied myself up to look like wunna those ladies with a pulse everyone’s so crazy about.
You stare. Did she look this beautiful when she was alive?
Now, I know to the winner goes the spoils, but surely yer enough of a gentleman to give me a bit a’ primer, right?

scene.name: SCENE 7
scene.directive: Ahhhhhh...
Yeah, right there.
Shit, that’s good...
I think we’re ready.
Hey dipshit, I said I’m ready!!
Friggin’... you want me to nut so soon?
We ain’t even got to the best part yet, ya nerd.
Why don’tcha get on the couch now? Dick side up, if it pleases.

scene.name: SCENE 8
scene.directive: Don’t worry about protection or nothin’, my babymaker’s been outta commission since gettin’ run through by a flamin’ piece of motorcycle shrapnel.
Oh fuck yes!
Come on bitch, I’m gonna--
Eh?
Dammit, ~player~, the fuck didja stop for? I was ‘bout to...
You tell her you want to try being on top.
Are you seriously askin’ me, Saki Nikaidou...
...Biker queen...
...Kamikaze squad leader...
...’N all around badass...
...To be yer bottom bitch?
Bwahahaa! Ya got guts, ~player~!
Well, ya creamed me in poker, so I s’pose you might as well cream me however you’d like!
Aight, ~player~. Skooch over a bit.

scene.name: SCENE 9
scene.directive: Don’t try makin’ this too romantic or nothin’.
That’d be gay.
Oooh!
You know, for some vanilla shit, this feels pretty good.
I ain’t delicate, though. Go harder.
Ah!
Oh shit!
Fuck fuck fuck fuck!
Fuck me ~player~!
Fuck me!
~Player~!!!!!
Shit, ~player~.
That was good.

scene.name: SCENE 10
scene.directive: You both take a minute or so to catch your breath.
You slowly pick yourselves off the couch. You feel a little bad for whoever has to clean that up.
Well, this is The Inventory. No doubt they’re used to this.

scene.name: SCENE 11
scene.directive: So, uh, ~player~.
I figured it was clear from the start, but this is a one-night-only kinda deal.
Idols ain’t s’posed ta have boyfriends n’ shit.
Though...
We do gotta lot of hangers-on in Saga...
Ain't no one gonna notice one lil' groupie if he keeps a low profile.
I guess if I saw ya at one of our shows, we could arrange for a second night stand?
Whaddya say? I bet I could even scrounge up a friend or two ta bring along!
You guess you’re buying a plane ticket tomorrow. Saga, here you come!
Ehe!
